items.sentence: We haven\'t seen much of Tom since Mary committed suicide.
We\'ve got to talk to Tom before he does something stupid.
You could buy all of those things if you really want them.
You have no idea where Tom plans to go to college, do you?
You may go to the party, but you must be home by midnight.
You might want to sit down. This is going to take a while.
You were too busy having fun to notice what was happening.
My mother has a driver\'s license, but she doesn\'t drive.
Is that the man whose wife was killed in the car accident?
Tom has already accomplished what he wanted to accomplish.
Tom is a pretty good singer, but he never sings at church.
Tom is in the living room watching cartoons with the kids.
Tom looked at me as if I were speaking a foreign language.
Tom loves the new toy that Mary gave him for his birthday.
What\'s in the beach bag that\'s in the trunk of your car?
I wonder whether or not Tom knows how poor Mary really is.
Tom is always acting like he\'s better than everyone else.
She wasn\'t wealthy enough to feed her dog meat every day.
I was able to finish the work earlier than I had expected.
Tom wished that he\'d put more money into that investment.
